Description
Feel like C. Viper from Street Fighter IV with this beautiful and deadly battlesuit top! Try it with the matching bottom! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Fühle dich mit diesem ebenso schönen wie tödlichen oberen Teil eines Kampfanzuges wie C. Viper aus Street Fighter IV! Kombiniere es mit dem passenden unteren Teil! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like C. Viper from Street Fighter IV with this beautiful and deadly battlesuit top! Try it with the matching bottom! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Diventa C. Viper di Street Fighter IV con la parte superiore della sua bella e letale uniforme! Provala con la parte inferiore! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 바이퍼가 되는 슈트(상의). 상, 하의를 맞추면 당신도 오늘부터 미즈 퍼팩트! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
